_header: Jesu that wouldest for mans sake
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Oxford, Bodleian Library Addit. A.11 (SC 28746): Robbins and Cutler (1965)
XRossell Hope Robbins, and John L. Cutler. Supplement to the Index of Middle English Verse. Lexington, Kentucky: University of Kentucky Press, 1965 apparently confused SC 28746 with SC 29746.
_description: A simple prayer to Christ — two quatrains

BodLatTheD1.First Lines:
Ihesu þat woldist for manys sakeSuffrest þi bonys to
                    crake…
BodLatTheD1.Last Lines:
…& bere þe coroune þat was pynnyng& bryng vs
                    alle to good endyng
BodLatTheD1.Note: In a sermon by Friar Nicholas Philip.
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “The Sermon Booklets of Friar Nicholas Philip.” 
             Medium Ævum
         55 (1986): 188-202: 196-7.
